name: Five Nights at Chikis
description:
This game is unfinished and buggy, if you experience any problems playing the game, try opening the file with another browser. This game is a straight-up joke, so don't expect much.

●Alpha 1

-Release

●Alpha 2

-Poof Added

-HungerSystem

-Bug Fixes

-Sound effects

-New Door

-Ai Improved

●Alpha 3

-Both doors can close at once

-New animatronic

-New Sound Effects

-New Phone Call

-Minor VFX Fixes

-Secret Character

-Background Noise Softer

-Music Softer
